skill.name: changelog
skill.description: Maintains IdeaVim changelog (CHANGES.md) and build.gradle.kts changeNotes. Use when updating changelog, documenting releases, or reviewing commits/PRs for changelog entries.
skill.summary: Maintains IdeaVim changelog (CHANGES.md) and build.gradle.kts changeNotes. Use when updating changel...
skill.author: JetBrains

security_audit.summary: Only guidance text is present. No executable code, file access, or network activity is implemented in this directory.

content.value_statement: You need consistent release notes across CHANGES.md and changeNotes. This skill gives precise rules to keep them aligned.
actual_capabilities: Define the structure for [To Be Released] and version sections
Specify formatting rules for Features, Fixes, Changes, and Merged PRs
Require ticket and PR link formats for entries
Apply inclusion and exclusion rules for changelog items
Require changeNotes to match CHANGES.md content
limitations: Only applies to the IdeaVim changelog format
Requires repository context to identify real changes
Does not validate build or test results
Does not generate entries without source information

use_cases.title: Prepare a release section
use_cases.description: Move items from [To Be Released] into a new versioned section and add a fresh empty section.

use_cases.title: Sync Marketplace notes
use_cases.description: Copy [To Be Released] content into build.gradle.kts changeNotes without summarizing.

use_cases.title: Decide PR inclusion
use_cases.description: Apply exclusion rules and list relevant user visible changes with proper links.

prompt_templates.title: Add a fix entry
prompt_templates.scenario: Beginner update to a small change
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a Fixes entry for VIM-1234 that says ci" works in empty strings under [To Be Released] with correct link format.

prompt_templates.title: Draft a release
prompt_templates.scenario: A new version is ready for notes
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a 2.28.0 section dated 2024-09-15 and move current [To Be Released] items into it.

prompt_templates.title: Sync changeNotes
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert the current [To Be Released] section into build.gradle.kts changeNotes with the same entries and links.

prompt_templates.title: Audit recent PRs
prompt_templates.prompt: Review PRs since the last tag and list entries to add, excluding dependabot, internal refactors, and api module changes.

output_examples.input: List items to add under [To Be Released] for VIM-1234 fix and new gn feature.
output: Fixes: VIM-1234 Fixed ci" command in empty strings
Features: Added support for `gn` text object

best_practices: Use specific user visible examples from tests or code
Keep each change in only one section
Preserve the changelog gap note between 2.9.0 and 2.28.0
anti_patterns: Logging internal refactors that users cannot observe
Rewriting PR titles in the Merged PRs section
Summarizing changeNotes instead of matching CHANGES.md

faq.question: Is this compatible with other projects?
faq.answer: No. It is tailored to the IdeaVim changelog and changeNotes format.

faq.question: What limits apply to entries?
faq.answer: Entries should be concise and focused on user visible changes or notable PRs.

faq.question: Can it integrate with GitHub workflows?
faq.answer: Yes. It references git and gh commands for workflow based updates.

faq.question: Does it access sensitive data?
faq.answer: No. The skill content is guidance only and does not access files or credentials.

faq.question: What if information is missing or unclear?
faq.answer: Omit the entry rather than adding vague or unverifiable text.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic changelog tools?
faq.answer: It enforces IdeaVim specific sections, link formats, and exclusion rules.
